body.p: To verify Scality integration, Helion testers created a volume, attached to the volume, and created a file system.

ol.li:
Run the following command: stack@helion-cp1-c0-m1-mgmt:~$ cinder create --volume-type scality-sofs 1
Sample output:+---------------------+--------------------------------------+ | Property | Value | +---------------------+--------------------------------------+ | attachments | [] | | availability_zone | nova | | bootable | false | | created_at | 2016-05-04T20:50:25.817152 | | display_description | None | | display_name | None | | encrypted | False | | id | 3154aba8-730a-4b89-9b7c-93672a04ca00 | | metadata | {} | | multiattach | false | | size | 1 | | snapshot_id | None | | source_volid | None | | status | creating | | volume_type | scality-sofs | +---------------------+--------------------------------------+

p.b: To attach to the volume you just created:

ol.li: Run the following command: stack@helion-cp1-c0-m1-mgmt:~$ nova volume-attach 5587e557-ba82-499e-928e-4f65dea7c3e1 3154aba8-730a-4b89-9b7c-93672a04ca00 /dev/vdc

p.b: To create a file system on the volume:

ol.li: Run the following command: stack@helion-cp1-c0-m1-mgmt:~$ ssh -i .ssh/scalitykey.pem centos@10.246.65.28
